column1: # This file contains sample CSV rows for testing the bulk upload feature
# 1. Copy the CSV rows below (without the # comments) into a new file
# NOTE: These are example events with fictional data for testing purposes

column7: Large-scale HTTP flood from botnet. Approx 100Gbps traffic sustained for 2 hours. Mitigated with upstream provider assistance.
DNS amplification attack using misconfigured open resolvers. Amplification factor estimated at 50x. Attack vectors identified and blocked.
Coordinated attack combining volumetric floods and application-layer attacks. Investigation ongoing. Multiple attack patterns detected.
NTP amplification attack exploiting monlist command. Attack mitigated by upstream provider. Reflectors have been reported.
Classic SYN flood from botnet infrastructure. Mitigated with SYN cookies. Case closed. Attack lasted approximately 45 minutes.
Memcached amplification with extremely high amplification factor (50000x). Limited sharing due to ongoing investigation. Law enforcement notified.
SSDP reflection attack using vulnerable IoT devices. Botnet of approximately 10000 devices. Attack vectors being investigated.
UDP flood from gaming-focused botnet. Attack lasted 30 minutes. Service restored. Player base affected during prime hours.
